price: [The followers] will say, “It was you who used to delude us from the right way[6].”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
footnotes: [6] Or you used to pressure us, or deceived us with false oaths, or claimed to have the truth.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
